page.title: 20NEW DEVELOPMENTS
page.content: Our area has changed considerably in recent years and is still undergoing further change. Much of the Lansdowne Estate at G.R. 527 903 and 532 903 was built during the late 1950's and early 1960's on farm land. The South Lowestoft {Industrial Estate} in grid square 52 89, also built on land previously used for agriculture, is expanding rapidly. From G.R. 526 906 to G.R. 534 907 another {housing} estate on land previously used as a golf course, is almost complete. At G.R. 522 905 the Rosedale Gardens Estate of private dwellings is expanding westwards towards the village of Carlton Colville. The cost of new houses in this area ranges from 23,500 pounds for a two-bedroomed house to 40,000 for a four-bedroomed house. The {population} of the area is increasing rapidly.
